content: pattern instruction nr 1001-183-2383 cotton kings sultan deluxe pattern instruction nr 1001-183-2383 hobbii twister more languages 1001-183-2383 cotton kings sultan deluxe danish 1 norwegian 2 swedish 3 french 4 dutch 5 german 6 for pattern instructions in the other languages or/and yarn change to the hobbii site page for your country/language at the bottom of the hobbii site ---------- the popular and beautiful **virus shawl** is crocheted in cotton kings sultan deluxe or hobbii twister both are available in a large variety of color combinations with beautiful long color transitions the pattern contains a detailed visual guide as well as video tutorials for the pattern **video tutorial for part 1 here ** https //www youtube com/watch v=pknc--igrpo **video tutorial for part 2 here ** https //www youtube com/watch v=cmy0yvpaioq 1 https //hobbii dk/virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 2 https //hobbii no/virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 3 https //hobbii se/virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 4 https //hobbii fr/virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 5 https //hobbii nl/virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 6 https //hobbii de/virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=virus-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=karen
